mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY( REPLY_NUM, POST_NUM, USER_ID, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_DATE) values( reply_seq.nextval, #{postNum}, #{userId}, #{replyContent}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = #{replyContent}, REPLY_DATE=SYSDATE where REPLY_NUM = #{replyNum}
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NUM, POST_NUM, USER_ID, REPLY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REPLY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REPLY_DATE FROM ( SELECT /*+INDEX(reply idx_reply) */ rownum rn, REPLY_NUM, POST_NUM, USER_ID, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_DATE FROM reply where POST_NUM = #{postNum} and reply_Num > 0 and rownum <= #{crt.pageNum} * #{crt.amount} ) where rn > (#{crt.pageNum} -1) * #{crt.amount}
SELECT COUNT(REPLY_NUM) from REPLY WHERE POST_NUM = #{post_Num}
